mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ADDRESS, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_ESTABLISH_DATE, COMPANY_HOMEPAGE, COMPANY_INTRODUCE, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_LICENSE, COMPANY_LOGO, COMPANY_PRESIDENT_NAME, COMPANY_INCHARGE_NAME, COMPANY_INCHARGE_EMAIL, COMPANY_INCHARGE_PHONENUMBER, COMPANY_PREFER, COMPANY_REVENUE, COMPANY_EMPLOYEES, COMPANY_MODIFY_DATE FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_NUMBER = #{comNo}

SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ADDRESS, COMPANY_TYPE , COMPANY_ESTABLISH_DATE, COMPANY_HOMEPAGE, COMPANY_INTRODUCE , COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_PASSWORD, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_LICENSE , COMPANY_LOGO, COMPANY_PRESIDENT_NAME, COMPANY_INCHARGE_NAME , COMPANY_INCHARGE_EMAIL, COMPANY_INCHARGE_PHONENUMBER , COMPANY_PREFER, PERMISSION, COMPANY_CREATE_DATE, COMPANY_MODIFY_DATE FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_NUMBER = #{comNo}

SELECT RNC.RN, RNC.COMPANY_NUMBER, RNC.COMPANY_LOGO, RNC.COMPANY_NAME , RNC.COMPANY_TYPE, RNC.COMPANY_HOMEPAGE, RNC.COMPANY_CREATE_DATE, RNC.RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE, RNC.PERSONAL_NUMBER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_LOGO, COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_HOMEPAGE, COMPANY_CREATE_DATE, RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE, PERSONAL_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT C.COMPANY_NUMBER, C.COMPANY_LOGO, C.COMPANY_NAME, C.COMPANY_TYPE, C.COMPANY_HOMEPAGE , C.COMPANY_CREATE_DATE, R.RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE, R.PERSONAL_NUMBER FROM COMPANY C INNER JOIN RECOMMEND R ON C.COMPANY_NUMBER = R.COMPANY_NUMBER WHERE PERSONAL_NUMBER = #{perNo} ORDER BY RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE DESC ) ) RNC WHERE RNC.RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COMPANY.RNUM, COMPANY.COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY.COMPANY_INCHARGE_NAME, COMPANY.COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY.COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY.PERMISSION, COMPANY.COMPANY_CREATE_DATE , COMPANY.COMPANY_MODIFY_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, C.COMPANY_NUMBER, C.COMPANY_INCHARGE_NAME, C.COMPANY_CODE , C.COMPANY_NAME, C.PERMISSION, C.COMPANY_CREATE_DATE, C.COMPANY_MODIFY_DATE FROM ( SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_INCHARGE_NAME, COMPANY_CODE , COMPANY_NAME, PERMISSION, COMPANY_CREATE_DATE , COMPANY_MODIFY_DATE FROM COMPANY ORDER BY COMPANY_NUMBER ) C ) COMPANY

SELECT PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NUMBER, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NAME, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_ID , PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NICKNAME, PERSONAL.PERMISSION, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE , PERSONAL.PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, P.PERSONAL_NUMBER, P.PERSONAL_NAME, P.PERSONAL_ID , P.PERSONAL_NICKNAME, P.PERMISSION, P.PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE, P.PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM( SELECT PERSONAL_NUMBER, PERSONAL_NAME, PERSONAL_ID,PERSONAL_NICKNAME , PERMISSION, PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE, PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM PERSONAL ORDER BY PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE DESC ) P ) PERSONAL

SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_PASSWORD, PERMISSION, COMPANY_INCHARGE_NAME ,COMPANY_INCHARGE_EMAIL, COMPANY_INCHARGE_PHONENUMBER, COMPANY_NAME ,COMPANY_ADDRESS, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_ESTABLISH_DATE , COMPANY_HOMEPAGE, COMPANY_INTRODUCE FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{comCode} AND COMPANY_PASSWORD = #{comPwd}

SELECT COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_PASSWORD, PERMISSION, COMPANY_INCHARGE_NAME ,COMPANY_INCHARGE_EMAIL, COMPANY_INCHARGE_PHONENUMBER, COMPANY_NAME ,COMPANY_ADDRESS, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_ESTABLISH_DATE , COMPANY_HOMEPAGE, COMPANY_INTRODUCE FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{comCode} AND COMPANY_PASSWORD = #{comPwd}
